pr_title: [FLINK-18607][build] Give the maven module a human readable name

timeline.author: KurtYoung
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -29,7 +29,7 @@ under the License.
 	</parent>
 
 	<artifactId>flink-examples-streaming-gcp-pubsub_${scala.binary.version}</artifactId>
-	<name>flink-examples-streaming-gcp-pubsub</name>
+	<name>Flink : Examples : Dist : Streaming Google PubSub</name>

replies.bodyText: Yes, can be. I had doubts about this one. The artifact name is build helper yet the purpose is making it available in the dist.
replies.author: nielsbasjes

replies.bodyText: For now I made it consistent with the module artifact name : "Build Helper".
replies.author: nielsbasjes

replies.bodyText: I personally would rename this to something like "dist helper" or "dist examples" but that is a separate change if desired.
replies.author: nielsbasjes

timeline.message: [FLINK-18607][build] Give the maven module a human readable name
[FLINK-18607][build] Give the maven module a human readable name
